## runWithStreamingCallback() function

Executes provided function with streaming callback in async local storage which can be retrieved using [getStreamingCallback()](./core.getstreamingcallback.md)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function runWithStreamingCallback<S, O>(streamingCallback: StreamingCallback<S> | undefined, fn: () => O): O;
```
